website_summaries.verdict: Tried and trusted anti-colic bottles with an easy to clean valve system. A comprehensive kit with a variety of bottle-feeding essentials.
pros: Airflex valve prevents a vacuum effect and reduces the amount of air swallowed during feeds
Ribbed nipples are specially designed not to collapse and help babies achieve a proper latch
Comes with bottles and nipples for different stages
Kit includes a formula dispenser, bottle brush, and orthodontic pacifier
cons: Some parents felt the newborn nipple flowed a bit too fast

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says!
customer_reviews.text: It definitely reduces the amount of air my 3 week old son is swollowing. He has a tongue tie that the doctor wants to wait another 2 weeks to see if he latch gets better before he snips it. We have the normal Avent bottles with the newborn nipples and they also help reduce air consumption. But the nipples on these anticolic bottles are shaped a lot different! And if your still thinking about purchasing these just go on baby’s r us website and look to see how much 1 single bottle costs with an anticolic nipples on it for newborns. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: DougE

customer_reviews.title: Either I'm doing something wrong or these just leak. Either way, they're not user friendly (or blonde-friendly?)
customer_reviews.text: Umm, not sure why but the milk leaks out from the edges of the nipple. I secure them very well but they just leak all over baby's face and clothes! I'm going back to the Avent Naturals; they don't leak. Waste of money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Glam Danni

customer_reviews.title: So/so
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving it a 3 star review because it was a great deal price wise for what you got, but I can't say I love the bottles. The brush in here isn't easy to use as a bottle brush and the formula container was hard to shake formula out of(notice I said SHAKE, because it wouldn't easily pour). This seems to be a popular brand so that's why I gave it a try, and I will say that I was impressed with how long the nipples lasted and didn't retain any smells like some of the cheaper brands do. I was introduced to a brand called Como Tomo and I'll never use anything else but that.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Good bottles but nipple isnt slow flowing
customer_reviews.text: The bottles seem durable, easy to clean. My one complaint is that they are supposed to be slow flow nipples and milk comes out fairly quickly. I hold the bottle upside down and the milk comes out in very quick drops. My baby is one week old and she choked quickly using this bottle. They will likely be fine when she is older, but by then she will be eating more so the small bottles wont really be of much use to us, unless I can get even slower flow nipples.
customer_reviews.author: ReneeRTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if my son is just naturally a messy eater, but when he feeds with these bottles (and other brands)I’m constantly wiping the formula off his chin and neck. I love the formula holder and the brush. But my son isn’t a fan of the pacifiers. They don’t stay in his mouth. But this bottle seems to be the better bottle for my colic son. He rarely fusses when he eats now unlike when he used other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: They are extremely easy to clean and use, and the material which is made will work wonders in the baby's little mouth. With a reasonable price, it's one of the best products you can find out there
customer_reviews.author: Andres Veliz

customer_reviews.title: This is a great set. The nipple flow is a little fast ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set. The nipple flow is a little fast for my little one right now (even with a #1 nipple), but he will be able to use them more effectively pretty soon I think. Love that it comes with the brush and different sized bottles/nipples as well as the sippy cup handles for when my boy gets a bit older!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Not for lack of closing them properly but between the nipples and the white bottle head leaks so much. Wasting milk. At first I thought it was the baby. But upon closer inspection saw that upon tilting the bottles in any directiona small stream erupted from the aforementioned place. I tried replacing the nipples. Removing them and putting them back. Cleaning it. To no avail. And I bought two sets. Waste. Aside from this these bottles advertised as Anti Colic. So why is it that an exclusively bottle fed baby after 3weeks of exclusive use got Colic. I’m an RN and I understand Colic. These bottles didn’t help prevent it at all. Do not buy.

product_meta.title: Philips AVENT Anti-Colic Bottle Newborn Starter Set, Clear
product_meta.description:
Color:ClearPhilips Avent SCD394/01 BPA Free Anti-colic bottle Baby Bottle Newborn Starter Set makes bottle feeding easy. Each of the 4 BPA-free Anti-colic bottles included in this set features a clinically proven anti-colic valve for less air in baby's tummy and a more comfortable feeding experience. Designed to grow with babies, the set includes 2 Anti-colic 9 ounce/260ml bottles with 2 Anti-colic slow flow nipples, 2 Anti-colic 4 ounce/125ml bottles with 2 Anti-colic newborn nipples, Formula Dispenser, Bottle Brush, My First Transition Cup, and Newborn Silicone Pacifier. The Formula Dispenser holds 3 pre-measured portions of milk powder and is ideal for travel. The Bottle Brush's curved brush head and molded tip cleans hard to reach areas. The My First Transition Cup allows you to add handles to a familiar bottle and nipple and comes with a nipple and soft spout for easy training. The Newborn Silicone Pacifier has a soft, long-lasting silicone nipple and its orthodontic, flat, symmetrical shape respects the natural development of palate, teeth and gums

BRAND STORY
By Philips
feature_bullets: Ideal starter set with multiple bottle sizes designed to grow with baby and essential accessories
Clinically proven to reduce colic and discomfort
Airflex venting system reduces air ingestion, while the ribbed nipple texture prevents nipple collapse for uninterrupted feeding.
Only 3 parts for quick and easy cleaning and simple assembly
Includes 4 bottles, trainer cup, formula dispenser, pacifier and bottle brush. Over $50 in Value

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars538 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
